issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

iPod (4.1) with mobile sdk build 1.4.2.e6bd67

1.Phone>Sound>Local (or any of the first 3)
2.tap and watch the as the window animates out, when the new window draws in

results: the animation is still occuring when the new window draws in, there is a brief period where both windows appear (though only in a small part of the left side of the screen - unable to grab a screenshot during the short period it happens).

seen in 1.4.0

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: window drawn prior to animation finishing

comments.body: Still valid SDK 2.2.0.014b86f. The behavior seen is that the new window draws over the old window while it's animating out; you may need to go back and forth between Phone>Sound and Phone>Sound>Local via the navigation bar a couple of times to see this.
Closing ticket as Invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
